inclusion.criterion: Initial diagnosis of operable invasive breast carcinoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Histologically proven axillary metastasis (cytology or biopsy) before NAC
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient included in a therapeutic approach of neoadjuvant chemotherapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Procedure for the detection of sentinel lymph node by isotopic method +/- colorimetric
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Information of the patient and obtaining written consent, signed by the patient and the investigator
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Affiliated patient or beneficiary of the social security
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Any prior chemotherapy for contralateral breast cancer
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Axillary metastasis not histologically proven before NAC
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer. She is a candidate for tumor resection and agrees to do so prior to chemotherapy.
